post.description: Creates a new user on the platform, the user can join either as a Mentee, or as a Mentor

password.description: User password (should meet platform's security policy)

post.summary: Logs a User into the platform
post.description: Authenticates a user and returns a token. The user must provide either an ID or an email, along with a password.

email.description: User email address (required if ID is not provided)

id.description: User ID (required if email is not provided)

post.summary: Logs the user out of the platform
post.description: Logs the user out by clearing the authentication token cookie. Requires an active session (partial or full).
Confirms a user's email address, requires a partial session
Sends a password reset email to the user

message.example: An email with the reset link has been sent to johndoe@gmail.com

post.description: Resets the user's password using a provided token
Updates the authenticated user's password. Requires a full session

message.example: Password must be at least 8 characters long

get.summary: Get basic profile of a user by ID
get.description: Requires the user to be authenticated. Returns public profile information of a user, including ID, name, email, role, and associated links. Sensitive fields such as passwords and authentication tokens are excluded.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the user.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the user's profile information.

get.description: Requires the user to be authenticated. Returns basic user information including ID, name, email, role, and other optional profile fields.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the user's profile information.

patch.description: Requires the user to be authenticated. Allows the user to update their profile information. At least one updatable field must be provided.

bio.example: I'm passionate about clean code and teaching developers.

country.description: A valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code

timezone.description: A valid IANA time zone name

400.description: Validation error or no valid fields provided

message.example: At least 1 attribute should be provided to update

get.summary: Get all links associated with the authenticated user
get.description: Requires the user to be authenticated. Returns an array of all the user's added links.

post.summary: Add a new link to the authenticated user's profile
post.description: Requires the user to be authenticated. Adds a new link (e.g. portfolio or social profile) to the user's profile.

message.example: Link URL must be a valid HTTPS URL

patch.summary: Update an existing link for the authenticated user
patch.description: Requires the user to be authenticated. Allows the user to update an existing link by its ID. At least one of `linkName` or `linkUrl` must be provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the link to update.

400.description: Validation error or no valid fields provided

message.example: At least 1 attribute should be provided to update

404.description: Link not found or does not belong to the user

delete.summary: Delete an existing link for the authenticated user
delete.description: Requires the user to be authenticated. Deletes a link belonging to the user by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the link to delete.

204.description: Successfully deleted the link. No content returned.

404.description: Link not found or does not belong to the user

put.description: Uploads a new profile picture for the authenticated user. If an image already exists, it will be replaced. Only image files are allowed, and the file size must not exceed 2MB.

200.description: Profile picture uploaded or updated successfully.

400.description: Bad request - no image provided or unsupported file type.

500.description: Internal server error - failed to upload image.

delete.description: Deletes the authenticated user’s existing profile picture from Supabase storage.

404.description: No profile picture found to delete.

message.example: Resource to be deleted not found

post.description: Report a user who violated platform guidelines.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user being reported

message.example: You have already reported this user.

post.description: Allows an authenticated user with the COMMUNITY_MANAGER role to create a new community. Each user may create only one community. All fields are required.

description.example: A community for developers, designers, and tech enthusiasts to collaborate and share ideas.
A community for developers, designers, and tech enthusiasts to collaborate and share ideas.

400.description: Validation failed or ID already taken.

message.example: Forbidden: You are not authorized to do this action

409.description: Conflict - user already has a community.

get.description: Retrieves the community that is managed by the currently authenticated user. Only users with the COMMUNITY_MANAGER role can access this endpoint.

description.example: A community for developers building Growthly features and tools.

patch.description: Allows a COMMUNITY_MANAGER to update their own community's information such as name or description. Requires authentication and appropriate role.

description.example: A friendly community for developers, designers, and tech enthusiasts to collaborate and grow.
A friendly community for developers, designers, and tech enthusiasts to collaborate and grow.

400.description: Bad request - no updatable attributes provided or invalid format

message.example: At least 1 attribute should be provided to update

404.description: Not found - user has no community to update

put.summary: Upload or update the community image
put.description: Allows a COMMUNITY_MANAGER to upload or update the image associated with their community. The image must be provided as multipart/form-data under the key `image`. This endpoint replaces any previously uploaded image.

image.description: The image file to upload (must be an image type, max size 2MB)

400.description: Bad request - missing or invalid image file

404.description: Community not found for authenticated manager

delete.description: Allows a COMMUNITY_MANAGER to delete the image associated with their community. If no image exists, it returns a 404 error.

404.description: No community or image found to delete

message.example: Resource to be deleted not found

500.description: Failed to delete the image from storage

get.summary: Get join requests for the manager's community
get.description: Retrieves all pending join requests submitted by users who wish to join the authenticated community manager's community.
Fetches the public details of a specific community by its ID. The response includes the number of participants and the public image URL (if available).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the community to retrieve

description.example: A community for developers building Growthly features and tools.

post.description: Allows a Mentee or Mentor to request to join a specific community. A user cannot submit multiple requests to the same community.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the community to join

message.example: You've already submitted a request to join this community

delete.summary: Withdraw join request from a community
delete.description: Allows a Mentee or Mentor to withdraw a previously submitted request to join a specific community.

message.example: You haven't submitted a request to join this community
